description:
The GRAMMY Awards are presented annually by the Recording Academy. For the 68th Annual GRAMMY Awards, nominations are scheduled for November 7, 2025, and the ceremony for February 1, 2026.

This market will resolve according to the listed arrangement that wins Best Arrangement, Instrumental or A Capella at the 68th Annual GRAMMY Awards.

If, for any reason, no winner is declared by June 30, 2026, 11:59 PM ET, or in case of a tie for the winner, this market will resolve in favor of the listed arrangement that comes first in alphabetical order.

The resolution source will be the television broadcast of the awards and the Grammy website (https://www.grammy.com/); however, other credible reporting may be used.

events.title: Grammys: Best Arrangement, Instrumental or A Capella Winner

question: Will "Be Okay - Cynthia Erivo" win Best Arrangement, Instrumental or A Cappella at the 68th annual GRAMMY Awards?
